content:
The FHIR Community has been working on a Custom resource policy that is proposed here: http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=FHIR_Custom_Resources

The next step is that FGB will approve the policy and then ask FMG to implement the policy. Before FGB gives approval, we wanted to be sure FGB members had a chance to provide input. Given the challenge of Canadian holiday for today’s call and US holiday for next week’s call, we proposed moving the discussion to email. The policy was discussed on today’s FGB call and there was support to adopt the policy among those on the call.

Action: Please review the policy and ask questions via email or chat.fhir.org in the FGB stream.

When input is collected and answers are provided, the proposal is that we have a round of email motion/second/discussion/vote so we can close out the policy recommendation given all the two overlapping Monday holidays.
Reminder to read/comment on the Custom Resource policy. Given that we did not start an evote this week, maybe this can be quickly covered in the May 30th call and approved?
Anne will be off, so we may not have a GTM
